Different Crime.Crime Name: Failure to exhaust appeal rights under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act

legal_basis: paragraph 72(2)(a) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
application_details: applicant was found inadmissible due to serious criminality and ordered deported
procedure_followed: Federal Court reviewed whether the applicant could bypass the IAD appeal before seeking judicial review
decision_reasoning: judicial review cannot be sought until all appeals are exhausted
result_of_case: application for judicial review is dismissed
